emulator module¶

emulator.emulate(fiducial_model, derivatives, params, fiducial_params)[source]¶
emulator.emulator_data_from_files(fiducial_file, deriv_filenames)[source]¶

compute the emulated observable from the linear model defined by the fiducial model in ‘fiducial_file’ and the derivatives defined in ‘deriv_files’

deriv_files should be a list of tuples, where the first part of the tuple is the filename, and the second part is the parameter value to emulate, and the third part is the parameter value of the fiducial model

emulator.load_derivative_file(filename)[source]¶
